Text: Do you have a fix for other languages â€‹â€‹such as Czech?

I've tried only for english, it works for the other languages because the crash in english after patch 1.13 Skidrow. but first u have to pick a language of your in instalation, patches and launcher then start the game.

The file working fine, but the changes in Merc list and Cambria crash from patch 1.13b.

You have to chose your language in:
1. installation
2. patches
3. Launcher
Then it can work. if ur already have other language or patch, Uninstall the game and reinstall by following the steps up there.

Besides, after past the file in game folder you can play the game in full english with patch 1.13a.
(Normal Mrcenaries list, and Cambria playable)
